chapter.title: Design Overview
chapter.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; has been designed as simple library which enables user to encode and decode streams according to ASN rules. It provides user with tools to process primitives and build more complex object according to definition in ASN.

note.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; does not provide ASN compiler . It sole purpose is to avoid costly processing and allow user to implement desired functionality in optimal way.
